title: ECP to release preliminary constituency list on Sept 27
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 26 (APP): The Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) is set to unveil the preliminary roster of new electoral constituencies derived from the digital Census 2023 on Wednesday.
Despite the initial release date set for October 10, the commission wrapped up its work 15 days ahead of schedule.
Consequently, the preliminary lists have been handed over to the ECP for publication on Tuesday.
Objections will be accepted until October 26, followed by hearings on objections until November 25. The final lists are slated for release on November 30, after which the Election Commission has confirmed the elections will take place in the last week of January 2024.
